name: Naelara Adventures Ch:0
description:
Naelara Adventures Ch:0 Is a mini adventure starring you, the captain of your own ship, but something has gone wrong on the ship. Explore and try out the character customization features in this small preview of the game!

Controls:

Right mouse button to move, Left mouse button to click on the speech bubble and interact with the environment.

I'm working on getting keyboard support in to have the experience feel better.

Want to know more about the game and where its going?

Follow its development on twitter @Bugbear_legends

Or check out my Patreon for early sneak previews!

Let me know what you think of the game so far!
